name: zol.com.cn Ad cleaner
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("zol.com.cn") {
div[id^="adtop"],
div[class="top"],
div[id^="AD"],
div[class$="logo"],
div[class^="ad"],
div[class="lan12b"],
div[class^="adSpace"],
div[class^="se_txt"],
div[class^="logo"],
div[class="body_right"],
div[id^="Bar"],
div[id$="flash1"],
div[class^="bl_botm"],
div[class^="wz"],
div[id^="float"],
div[id^="z_"],
div[id^="Float"],
div[class^="live"],
div[class^="tltop"],
div[class^="bodyL tltop"],
div[class^="bd_lan bgImg"],
div[class^="foot"],
div[class="bl_img_mid"],
iframe {
display:none !important ;
}
}
